verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> when they ran <S%G5302>out<s%> of <S%G3631>wine<s%>, the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G5201>waterpots<s%> of <S%G3035>stone<s%>, after the manner <S%G2596>of<s%> the <S%G2512>purifying<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G5562>containing<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3355>firkins<s%> <S%G303>apiece<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1072>Fill<s%> the <S%G5201>waterpots<s%> with <S%G5204>water<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1072>filled<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> up <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G507>brim<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>, Draw <S%G501>out<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5342>bear<s%> to the governor of the <S%G755>feast<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they bore <S%G5342>it<s%>.

<S%G5613%G99999>When<s%> the ruler of the <S%G755>feast<s%> had <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> that was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%>: <S%G1161>(but<s%> the <S%G1249>servants<s%> which <S%G501>drew<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%>;) the governor of the <S%G755>feast<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> at the <S%G4412>beginning<s%> does set <S%G5087>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> men have well <S%G3184>drunk<s%>, <S%G5119>then<s%> that which is <S%G1640>worse<s%>: but <S%G4771>you<s%> have <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3631>the<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> those that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G1016>oxen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4058>doves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the changers of <S%G2773>money<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G5416>scourge<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> small <S%G4979>cords<s%>, he <S%G1544>drove<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1016>oxen<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> the <S%G2855>changers<s%>' <S%G2772>money<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G390>overthrew<s%> the <S%G5132>tables<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them that <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G4058>doves<s%>, <S%G142>Take<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> out of <S%G1782>here<s%>; <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>'s <S%G3624>house<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G1712>merchandise<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> do you <S%G1166>show<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%>, seeing <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>?

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> he had <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3415>remembered<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2036>said<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G3957>passover<s%>, <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> <S%G4183>day<s%>, many <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, when they <S%G2334>saw<s%> the <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%>.
